text: @WhiteHouse @fema @CDCgov @dougducey @realDonaldTrump You will certainly say the information in this article is FAKE because of another one of your "gut feelings". Using your gut instead of your brain is killing Americans and putting more at risk. https://t.co/hlUImT2Znf
